item.title: The Blackprint - A Manifesto for the New World Order
item.description: how to survive and thrive in the post nation-state AI driven reality

item.title: Asylum Sidepots. How to Escape the Matrix and Stay Out
item.description: Escaping the socio-spiritual prison from the starting position of a speculator Sidepots in the Asylum When I started trading, I was in it for money and pride. My father lost a lot of money starting a hedge fund and we lost our house when I was a kid. I got into trading as some kind of redemption arc. My father is a renegade. He viewed markets as a way to escape the simulation.

item.title: The Absurdity Supercycle- Being Early After the End of History
item.description: reflections on recent price action, ARK investments, Palantir, and crypto
